metadata.title: CVE-2021-47059 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: crypto:sun8i-ss - fix result memory leak on error path This patch fixes a memoryleak on an error path.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
